name: mcp-apps-playground
description: Multi-app MCP Apps playground - build apps that work on ChatGPT and Claude Desktop

scripts.build: npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:echo && npm run build:calculator && npm run build:hospi-copilot && npm run build:pdf-generator && npm run build:file-processor
scripts.build:echo: tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && cross-env APP=echo vite build --config vite.app.config.ts
scripts.build:calculator: tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && cross-env APP=calculator vite build --config vite.app.config.ts
scripts.start:echo: concurrently 'cross-env APP=echo NODE_ENV=development vite build --watch --config vite.app.config.ts' 'tsx watch apps/echo/standalone.ts'
scripts.start:calculator: concurrently 'cross-env APP=calculator NODE_ENV=development vite build --watch --config vite.app.config.ts' 'tsx watch apps/calculator/standalone.ts'
scripts.build:hospi-copilot: tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && cross-env APP=hospi-copilot vite build --config vite.app.config.ts
scripts.start:hospi-copilot: concurrently 'cross-env APP=hospi-copilot NODE_ENV=development vite build --watch --config vite.app.config.ts' 'tsx watch apps/hospi-copilot/standalone.ts'
scripts.build:pdf-generator: tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && cross-env APP=pdf-generator vite build --config vite.app.config.ts
scripts.start:pdf-generator: concurrently 'cross-env APP=pdf-generator NODE_ENV=development vite build --watch --config vite.app.config.ts' 'tsx watch apps/pdf-generator/standalone.ts'
scripts.build:file-processor: tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && cross-env APP=file-processor vite build --config vite.app.config.ts
scripts.start:file-processor: concurrently 'cross-env APP=file-processor NODE_ENV=development vite build --watch --config vite.app.config.ts' 'tsx watch apps/file-processor/standalone.ts'
